name: inquisitively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows that you want to discover as much as you can about something, or want to know something: The mouse looked around the room inquisitively. "Who's Rosie?" asked Danny inquisitively. See
inquisitive
More examplesFewer examplesShe glanced inquisitively between the two of them.They peered inquisitively to see what was happening.The dog ran happily and inquisitively around the house.
